title: Diagnositics
content:
Is there clarity with the actions, targets and strategy of the company?.

 Is there a visual daily tool that give us the direction and everybody is commit with? Is there clarity of what everybody is doing?.

title: Strategic Business Plan
content: Let me scan the overall of the priority process and key activities that direct to the strategy. Every key activity should have measurable objectives by KPI´s. Now we have build the Strategic Business Plan.

title: Business Inteligence and Analytics Engineering
content: Using Analytics Engineering, I bridge the data structure with Data Analysts to transform raw data into analytical models ready for our used to read the SBP. The Analytic Engineering defined what is going to show in the dashboards and reports.

title: Visualization Tool and Data Culture
content: And now, I create the daily visual tools that keep update and online all the desicion-makers alined to the Business Plan. Creative dashboards that every area can read it and undestand it. also integrated with forecast models. It´s time that everyone speak the same Data Culture.
